plugin.name: BBCSounds
plugin.creator: ExpectingToFly
plugin.changes: NEW 2.50.5 Fix sign-in to BBC Account
plugin.desc: Complete BBC Sounds implementation as an LMS Plugin. BBC live radio, catch-up, music mixes and podcasts.
plugin.title: BBC Sounds

plugin.name: VirginRadio
plugin.creator: ExpectingToFly
plugin.changes: NEW 3.0.0 Now with all News UK stations : Talk Radio, talkSport, Times Radio and Virgin Radio
plugin.desc: Virgin Radio (UK) Plugin. Access to live and 7 day catch up for Virgin Radio, Talk Radio, talkSport and Times Radio, includes all News UK stations
plugin.title: Virgin Radio (UK)

plugin.name: TimesRadio
plugin.creator: ExpectingToFly
plugin.changes: NEW 2.3.0 FIX : Restore functionality after API changes
plugin.desc: Times Radio (UK) Live and 7 Day Catch Up with on air data and images.
plugin.title: Times Radio

plugin.name: GlobalPlayerUK
plugin.creator: ExpectingToFly
plugin.changes: NEW 2.7.1 Fixed programme transition pauses and corruption (At last !)
plugin.desc: Global Radio's UK Stations (Classic FM, Capital, Heart, LBC, Radio X etc) Live Radio (with pause and rewind), Catch-up, Live Playlists, Podcasts.
plugin.title: Global Player (UK)

plugin.name: RadioFavourites
plugin.creator: ExpectingToFly
plugin.changes: New 1.2.0 Radio Favourites Editor in preferences; Folders as standard Favourites
plugin.desc: Radio Favourites - Manage your favourite radios stations. Select your station according to the current live programme.
plugin.title: Radio Favourites
